reactor.core.alloc

Class RingBufferAllocator<T extends Recyclable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.core.alloc.RingBufferAllocator<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Allocator<T>

    public class RingBufferAllocator<T extends Recyclable>
extends Object
implements Allocator<T>
    An Allocator implementation based int the LMAX Disruptor RingBuffer.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin
